data.oai_dc:dc: Parametric sediment echo sounder survey during R/V Heincke cruise HE478 in the German Bight with link to raw data files

Parametric sediment echo sounder data were collected during R/V Heincke cruise HE478 with a Innomar SES-2000 medium. Data recording was executed along 92 parallel profiles in North Sea within German EEZ. The survey speed was 4-5 knots. The primary frequency is 100 kHz and the secondary 15 kHz.
CT, DATE/TIME, HE478, HE478-track, Heincke, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, North Sea, Underway cruise track measurements, Uniform resource locator/link to raw data file
